welcomeDescOne.message: Keress pénzt hirdetések nézésével, és továbbítsd támogatás formájában kedvenc tartalomkészítőidenk.

welcomeDescTwo.message: Mostantól tokeneket szerezhetsz adatvédelmet betartó hirdetések nézésével.

welcomeFooterTextOne.description: Link in the footer (takes you to rewards settings page) for welcome screen in the panel, existing user

welcomeHeaderOne.message: We’ve given Brave Rewards a big upgrade.

yourWallet.description: Title of wallet section where we display data about wallet

grants.description: Title for grant section in wallet summary

on.description: The whole string is 'Enable tips on YouTube for like.'

verifiedPublisher.description: Tells user that this particular publisher is verified publisher

rewardsContributeAttentionScore.description: Label for auto contribute table attention for the publisher

donateMonthly.description: Label for drop down menu where user select amount for monthly contribution for particular publisher

includeInAuto.description: Label for checkbox that allows user to exclude publishers from auto contribute

donateNow.description: CTA for sending tip form site banner

enableTips.description: The whole string is 'Enable tips on YouTube for like.'

for.description: The whole string is 'Enable tips on YouTube for like.'

rewardsSummary.description: Section title in wallet panel, which contains monthly rewards summary

tokenGrantClaimed.description: Title for grant section in wallet summary

earningsAds.description: Title for ads section in wallet summary

rewardsContribute.description: Title for auto contribute section in wallet summary

oneTimeDonation.description: Title for one time tips section in wallet summary

expiresOn.description: Used for grant representation. Whole string is '30.0 BAT expires on 08/05/2022'

recurringDonations.description: Title for monthly tips section in wallet summary

off.description: Label used in toggle indicating that toggle is off

ok.description: Used in notification to dismiss notification

braveAdsTitle.description: Notification title when we display info about ads

braveContributeTitle.description: Notification title when we display info about auto contribution

contributeNotificationSuccess.description: We show this string in the notification when contribution is successful

backupNow.description: Notification button text when we ask user to backup wallet

backupWalletTitle.description: Notification title when we ask user to backup wallet

insufficientFundsNotification.message: Your Brave Rewards account is waiting for a deposit.
insufficientFundsNotification.description: Description for new insufficient funds notification

braveRewardsCreatingText.description: Used in a button displaying wallet creation process

contributeNotificationError.message: Hiba történt a hozzájárulásod feldolgozása során.
contributeNotificationError.description: We show this string in notification when contribution fails

contributeNotificationNotEnoughFunds.message: Fedezethiány miatt az ütemezett havi automatikus hozzájárulást nem lehetett végrehajtani. 30 nap múlva újra megpróbáljuk.
contributeNotificationNotEnoughFunds.description: We show this string in the notification when you don't have enough funds for contribution

contributeNotificationTipError.message: Unable to send your tip. Please try again later.
contributeNotificationTipError.description: We show this string in notification when tip fails

noActivity.description: Allows the user to see that there have been no transactions or other activity in their wallet

captchaDrag.description: Directs the user to drag the BAT icon

captchaOnTheWay.description: Cosmetic text indicating grant funds are on the way

grantAlreadyClaimedText.message: Sajnáljuk, úgy tűnik ezt az adományt már igényelték.
grantAlreadyClaimedText.description: Description of the error when grant is already claimed.

grantGeneralErrorButton.description: Button text for clearing the error.

grantGeneralErrorText.message: A Brave Jutalmak problémába ütközött. Próbáld újra később.
grantGeneralErrorText.description: Error text when user is having problems claiming a grant.

grantGeneralErrorTitle.message: Hoppá, valami hiba történt. Próbáld újra később.
grantGeneralErrorTitle.description: Error title when user is having problems claiming a grant.

grantGoneButton.description: Button text for clearing the error.

grantGoneText.message: Sajnáljuk, úgy tűnik, ez az adomány már lejárt.
grantGoneText.description: Error text when user missed a grant.

grantGoneTitle.message: Ez az adomány már nem érhető el.
grantGoneTitle.description: Error title when user missed a grant.

unVerifiedPublisher.description: Status of the publisher shown in the panel

unVerifiedText.message: Ez az alkotó még nem regisztrált, hogy hozzájárulásokat fogadjon a Brave felhasználóktól. Minden borravaló, amit küldesz, a pénztárcádban marad, amíg nem igazolnak.

unVerifiedTextMore.description: Text for the link that explains more about reserved amount

reservedAmountText.message: Megjelöltél {{reservedAmount}} BAT-ot olyan alkotóknak, akik még nem regisztráltak, hogy fogadhassák a hozzájárulásokat. Böngésződ próbálkozni fog a folyósítással, amíg igazolnak, vagy eltelik 90 nap.
reservedAmountText.description: Notification about how much BAT do you have reserved

reservedMoreLink.description: Text for the link that explains more about reserved amount
